name: MindSpring Software
overview:
MindSpring Software is a full service software solution provider. Our software products are designed to promote interconnectivity and cross-industry support for dynamic demographics modeling while maintaining ease-of-entry for business and an intuitive interface for the frontline user.

MindSpring Software focuses on cash rich niche fragmented markets. We believe we have an attractive position in the market because a number of service industries are running antiquated software that will need updating in the very near future. Key industry specific research shows that some industries will see an 80% turnover in current software.

Our current business model is to offer superior software products that increase productivity regardless of industry, automatically performing tasks behind the scenes improving the user experience and simplifying tasks for front line employees.

Websites to Enterprise systems MindSpring Software is a cutting edge firm that has strong distribution channels and Executive Team!

MindSpring Software has multiple relationships with software companies that give us multiple revenues streams as Value Added Resellers in upcoming niche markets.
